author: {'steamid': '76561198226732312', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1620255307}
review: I may not have played much but if the rest of the game is like this I wouldn't bother. The game has extremely simple level design and that does not do it any favors. All the white is also kind of hard on my eyes. Not to mention there is no UI for your ability meter or lives, which makes it very frustrating to have to start a level over seemingly out of no where. If you want a top down there are better ones out there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1563976929}
review:
Story of a Cube would be a Unity asset flip but the game doesn't have any appreciable assets.  It's a retro pixel twin stick shooter where you control a cube and move around a minimalist pixel environment shooting things.  There is an associated plot with the game, but this is not worth getting into considering the many failings presented by the game.

On to the problems with the game!  Moving behind the obvious problems (retro pixel graphics are just laziness from a developer who can't afford an artist, and twin stick shooters are mostly a dead, outdated genre, but low effort so popular for talentless hacks), the graphics don't display properly and this can cause the game to just end without meaningful explanation.  There's some issue with the way the game draws on 4K monitors with high DPS settings enabled.    This renders the game unplayable for people with modern PCs. 

With so many faults and underwhelming quality of this game, I can't recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002749138', 'num_games_owned': 1292, 'num_reviews': 163, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1463557211}
review:
高難易度な全方位シューティング
ダンジョン的な作りのステージを右往左往してゴールに向かうのが目的。

[GOOD]
・シンプルでセンスの良いビジュアル
・ビジュアルにマッチしたサウンド
・残機数は9
・チェックポイント制で復活

[BAD]
・スキップできないイベントシーン
・シビアな動きを要求される即死トラップ
・サクサク死ねる高難易度
・自機ショットが弱く、砲台1つを相手にするだけで気がすり減る
・ゲームオーバーになるとステージの最初からやり直し

現状の難易度ではイライラが溜まるだけのストレスMAXゲーです。

51点

author: {'steamid': '76561197999647773', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1459651334}
review: The game's primary source of difficulty seems to be the inaccuracy of your weapons.  A lot of needless backtracking through cleared map sections could have been avoided with marginally better level design.  Honestly, as top down shooters go, I'd recommend finding another.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090472882', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 264, 'last_played': 1457700585}
review:
If you want a shooter thats going to push you to play the game better and better! Then I can't reccomend this highly enough, but beware anyone easily frustrated because behind the simple premise of story of a cube lies a deeply challenging game.

Pros

-Challenging gameplay
-Great soundtrack
-Good Level design
-Feeling of accomplishmernt after completing a difficult part

Cons

-Having to re-play the same part of the game over and over again.

FULL REVIEW

https://youtu.be/9_3osQxfXZg

author: {'steamid': '76561197995898288', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1463905837}

author: {'steamid': '76561198204648901', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1518066108}
review:
+一款类似于东方弹幕系列的游戏
+富有节奏感的BGM
+畅快淋漓的打击感
+干净整洁的画面
+快速而高效的流畅性

-难度略高
-如果你卡到了不好的点此时还有字幕的话，你会被炮台射到爆炸

8.5/10
我似乎是第一个国人买的这款游戏（或者已经有人买了还未评测）
干净整洁的画面吸引了我
富有节奏的BGM与流畅的画面和畅快淋漓的打击感
都使这款弹幕横版闯关游戏
让人爱不释手

author: {'steamid': '76561198245553534', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1600250609}
review: Wow, loving this title. It has a great style and feel to it, picture Thomas was Alone crossed with the old classics Robotron & Berzerk. A beautiful simplistic but stylistic art style mixed with an awesome soundtrack ;) (grabbing chiptune elements and mixing them with contemporary beats) and an addictive “just one more go!” gameplay makes this title highly recommended! :D
